content: in this legal case two parties referred to as grma and grbo were involved in a dispute over the estate of their late father gibo grma claimed that her sister grbo acted as a proxy and withdrew money from their fathers pension account which grma believed was meant for her grma also alleged that their father made donations to grbo which violated the civil code grma sought a declaration that the donations were invalid and requested the return of a specific amount of money the court declared the donations null and void but rejected grmas other claims both parties appealed the decision the court of appeal partially reformed the judgment and ordered grbo to pay grma a sum of euro 4350000 plus legal interest grbo was also required to transfer certain movable properties to grma the court divided the litigation costs equally between the parties with grbo responsible for the remaining expenses the specific amounts for each phase of the case were mentioned and a lumpsum reimbursement for general expenses was awarded the final resolution was issued on may 10 2023
